channel.title: The Roundtable Continues
channel.description: Recent content on The Roundtable Continues

item.title: GDC 2023
item.description: Carl at GDC 2023 Black Excellence in Game Development: The Designer’s Dilemma Location: Room 2016, West Hall Date: Wednesday, March 22 Time: 11:30 am - 12:30 pm Details on the GDC website Description In this incredible panel, game designers and industry professionals address how companies can better support black designers in creative and corporate dynamics.

item.title: People
item.description: Carl Varnado Carl Varnado is an author, educator, and content creator deeply committed to the development and growth of young people.
